column2: "Afei iyinom nye Esau (ɔnoara nye Edom) n'ebusuasantsen."
"Esau waar ne yernom wɔ Keenan mbabaa mu; Hetnyi Elon ne babaa Ada
column3: nye Hivinyi Zibeon ne babaa Ana ne babaa Oholibama;"

column2: "na Ismael ne babaa Basemat
"Na Ada woo Elifaz maa Esau; na Basemat woo Reuel;"
"na Oholibama woo Jeus
column4: nye Kora: woyinom nye Esau ne mba a wɔwoo hɔn wɔ Keenan asaase do no."

column2: "Na Esau faa ne yernom
column8: nye n'enyadze a onyaa no wɔ Keenan asaase do nyinara; na ɔtwee noho wɔ no nua Jakob ho kɔr asaase bi do."

column2: "Osiandɛ hɔn ahodze so dodow ma hɔn dɛ wɔbɛtsena fakor. Na asaase a wɔtse do no wɔnnsen do wɔ hɔn mbowa no ntsi."
"Na Esau a noara so nye Edom no tsenaa Seir bepɔw do."
"Na iyinom nye Esau
column3: Edomfo a wɔtse Seir bepɔw do hɔn egya no

column2: "Esau ne mbabanyin hɔn edzin nye yi; Elifaz
column3: Esau ne yer Ada ne ba no
column5: Esau ne yer Basemat ne ba no."

column2: "Na Elifaz ne mba nye Teman
"Na Esau ne ba Elifaz no nwewe nye Timna; na ɔwoo Amalek maa Elifaz. Woyinom nye Esau ne yer Ada n'asefo."
"Na Reuel ne mba nye woyinom; Nahat
column5: nye Miza. Woyinom nye Esau ne yer Basemat ne mba."

column2: "Na woyinom nye Esau ne yer Oholibama
column3: Zibeon ne babaa Ana ne babaa no ne mba; na ɔwoo Jeus

column2: "Woyinom nye Esau ne mba mu ekunyin: Esau n'abakan Elifaz ne mba; ekunyin Teman
column9: na Amalek. Woyinom nye ekunyin a wofi Elifaz no mu puei wɔ Edom asaase do; na woyinom nye Ada n'asefo."

column2: "Na Esau ne ba Reuel ne mba nye woyinom; ekunyin Nahat
column5: nye Miza: woyinom nye ekunyin a wofi Reuel mu puei wɔ Edom asaase do; woyinom nye Esau ne yer Basemat ne mba."

column2: "Na woyinom nye Esau ne yer Oholibama ne mba; ekunyin Jeus
column4: na okunyin Kora. Woyinom nye ekunyin a wofi Esau ne yer Oholibama
column5: Ana ne babaa no no mu puei."

column2: "Woyinom nye Esau a ɔnoara nye Edom no n'asefo
"Woyinom nye Hornyi Seir ne mba a nna wɔyɛ asaase no do mba no. Lotan
column8: Ezer nye Disan. Woyinom nye ekunyin a wofi Horfo
column9: Seir ne mba no hɔn mu puei

column2: "Na Lotan ne mba nye Hori na Heman. Nna Lotan n'akyerɛbaa nye Timna."
"Na Sobal ne mba nye woyinom; Alvan
"Na woyinom nye Zibeon ne mba; Aia nye Ana: oyi nye Ana a
column3: mber a ɔhwɛ n'egya Zibeon no nsoasopɔnkɔ no okohun nsuhyew mpumpunadze wɔ sar do no."

column2: "Na woyinom nye Ana ne mba; Dison na Oholibama
"Na woyinom nye Dison ne mba; Hemdan
"Ezer ne mba nye woyinom; Bilhan
"Dison ne mba nye woyinom: Uz nye Aran."
"Ekunyin a wofi Horfo mu puei nye woyinom; ekunyin Lotan
column9: na Disan. Ekunyin a wofi Horfo mu puei nye woyinom dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ekunyinyɛ tsetsee wɔ Seir asaase do."

column2: "Na ahemfo a wodzi hen wɔ Edom asaase do
column3: ansaana obiara ridzi Israelmba do hen no nye woyinom."

column2: "Na Beor ne ba Bela dzii hen wɔ Edom; na no kurow dzin dze Din-haba."
"Na Bela wui
column3: na Zera a ofi Bozra ne ba Jobab bedzii n'adze."

column2: "Na Jobab wui
column3: na Husam a ofi Temanfo hɔn asaase do bedzii n'adze."

column2: "Na Husam wui no Hadad
column3: Bedad a okum Midian wɔ Moab haban mu no
column4: ne ba no bedzii n'adze: na no kurow ne dzin dze Avit."

column2: "Na Hadad wui
column3: na Samla a ofi Masreka bedzii n'adze."

column2: "Na Samla wui no Saul a ofi Rehobot a ɔwɔ Esutsen no ho no bedzii n'adze."
"Na Saul wui
column3: na Akbor ba Baal-hanan bedzii n'adze."

column2: "Na Akbor ne ba Baal-hanan wui no
column3: Hadar bedzii n'adze: na no kurow ne dzin dze Pau; na ne yer ne dzin dze Mehetabel
column4: Me-zahab ne babaa Matred ne babaa a."

column2: "Na ekunyin a wofi Esau mu puei hɔn edzin nye yi; dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua
"Oholibama
"Kenaz
"Magdiel
column4: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn tsenabew tsetsee wɔ asaase a ɔyɛ hɔn enyadze no do. Oyi nye Esau
